_header: Lord sung have I ofte / In my five wits with will and thought
Title(s): ‘An orison for sauynge of þe fyue wyttes’
Bibliographic Ghosts: London, British Library Addit. 22283 [Simeon]: not in this MS.
_description: ‘An orison for sauynge of þe fyue wyttes’ — two 6-line stanzas

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
LOd sunged haue I ofteIn my fyue wittes wiþ wille
                    and þouȝte…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…And also lord in synful felyngȜif þi wille be.
                    AMEN.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:

             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

EETS

BLAdd37787.First Lines:
Lord syngud haue I ofteIn my .v. wittes wiþ wille &
                    þouhte…
BLAdd37787.Last Lines:
…And also lord in synful felyngȜif þi wille be. A M
                    E N
